title: Monument to Dr. Teles
body:
On May 14, 1939, a modest but significant and well-deserved monument was inaugurated with great solemnity in the gardens of the Mendicidade and Orphans Asylum, in memory of Dr. Alexandre da Cunha Teles, who had provided the most valuable benefits to that charitable institution and to various assistance services with his dedicated zeal, natural selflessness, and unlimited dedication.

## See

> Padrões demoráveis.

Dr. Alexandre da Cunha Teles: Physician and benefactor of the Mendicidade and Orphans Asylum

1939: Inauguration of the monument to Dr. Alexandre da Cunha Teles in the gardens of the Mendicidade and Orphans Asylum
